metadata.title: CVE-2014-9621 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The ELF parser in file 5.16 through 5.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a long string.

notes.note: mdeslaur> readelf.c not used in php5 introduced by fix for CVE-2014-9620

criterions.comment: file package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.22+15-2ubuntu1').
